resources.string: PREMIUM version feature
This is the free version of Printoid. The video streaming is available in the PREMIUM version, download it now on Google Play!
This is the free version of Printoid. The OctoPrint\'s plugins are available in the PREMIUM version, download it now on Google Play!
This is the free version of Printoid. The screen saver mode is available in the PREMIUM version, download it now on Google Play!
This is the free version of Printoid. The custom SSH and GCODE commands are available in the PREMIUM version, download it now on Google Play!
This is the free version of Printoid. The access to your OctoPrint web interface are available in the PREMIUM version, download it now on Google Play!
This is the free version of Printoid.\nThe add of more than one printer profile is available in the PREMIUM version, download it now on Google Play!
This is the free version of Printoid.\nThe GCODE & STL 3D visualizer is available in the PREMIUM version, download it now on Google Play!
This is the free version of Printoid.\nThe GCODE 2D layers visualizer is available in the PREMIUM version, download it now on Google Play!
This is the free version of Printoid.\nThe real time layer per layer visualizer is available in the PREMIUM version, download it now on Google Play!
This is the free version of Printoid.\nThe filament spool manager module is available in the PREMIUM version, download it now on Google Play!
Abort current print
This printing job will be canceled, do you want to continue?\nA canceled print could not be reloaded to its previous state, so your actual work will be lost.
Start printing job
The printing job will be started for the currently selected file, do you want to continue?
The printing job will be started for the file %s, do you want to continue?
Pause current print
This printing job will be paused, do you want to continue?
Resume current print
This printing job will be resumed, do you want to continue?
Restart current print
This printing job will be restarted, do you want to continue?\nThe previous job could not be reloaded to its previous state, so your actual work will be lost.
Delete OctoPrint profile
This OctoPrint profile will be deleted, are you sure?\nThis action can not be undone.
Video streaming

Warning!

If you encounter bad issues with the Printoid's embedded video player (black screen, connection error message, or in the worst case a crash of your OctoPrint server) you can switch the steaming mode to "Web view" in the settings.

Please contact the developer if this mode does not solve your problems :)
Remind me
Floating icon

The floating icon is a feature of Printoid which let you to keep an eye on your video streaming, wherever you are on your phone.\n\n Do you want to enable it right now? This feature can be enabled and disabled in the settings.
Snapshot ready
Your snapshot is ready, you can save it on your external storage or share it with someone.
Snapshot error
Printoid can\'t download your snapshot. Please check your configuration and retry.
Snapshot saved to %s
Printoid can\'t save your snapshot
License is invalid

Your license of Printoid seems not valid. The features of the %1$s version will be automatically deactivated.

Do you want to purchase the %2$s version of Printoid from Google Play?

(If you have already purchased the %3$s version, please click on the "Help" button)

[Error to communicate to the developer: %4$s]
Purchase
Restart to apply the new theme
You must restart the application to apply the new theme. Do you want to restart it now?
Restart to apply the new language
You must restart the application to apply the new language. Do you want to restart it now?
What do you want to do with this file? You can upload it on the current server, or render it in 2D or 3D.
Permission denied
Printoid is not able to perform this operation since you have denied the read external storage permission when prompted.\n\nDo you want to activate it manually?
Printoid is not able to perform this operation since you have denied the write external storage permission when prompted.\n\nDo you want to activate it manually?
Printoid is not able to perform this operation since you have denied the camera permission when prompted.\n\nDo you want to activate it manually?
Select tool
Select the extruder for the %s:
retraction
extrusion
Extruder %1$d (tool%2$d)
Keep tool in memory for the next 30sec
Can\'t select tool%d
Notice about fan speed value

There is no way in the standard GCODE syntax to retrieve the current fan speed value.\n\nThat\'s why Printoid in unable to set the fan slider\'s thumb to the actual value. If the slider shows 0%, that\'s not a bug but the expected behavior \uD83D\uDE48
Choose IP
Printoid seems currently not connected to your OctoPrint server.\nPlease choose the IP address (or hostname) to be used for this SSH command
Discover https://printoid.net, the Printoid\'s official website! Full changelogs, next releases, new features, useful tips & more!
Manage your stock of spools with the Filament Spool Manager module, compatible with Printoid PREMIUM! The free version of this module allows you to manage up to 2 spools.
Install now
Streaming not available.\nPlease verify your camera connection and the URL suffixes set in Printoid settings.
No file available
Screen\nlocked!
New OctoPrint version available! (v%s)
New OctoPrint release candidate available! (v%s)

Do you enjoy Printoid LITE? Support the developer of Printoid and purchase the PREMIUM version of the app!\n\nPrintoid PREMIUM is the best tool for your 3D printer(s): video streaming, custom commands, terminal, support of OctoPrint\'s plugins, 2D and 3D viewers, widgets, lock with fingerprint, integration with RollingUp (filament manager) and much more!

Do you enjoy Printoid PREMIUM? Is this app your best companion for your 3D printer?\n\nIf yes and if you want, you can donate the amount of your choice to support the developer and his work, and help to the development of new amazing features!
Overlay service (streaming bubble)
Streaming by overlay opened
Click here to close the streaming service
Baby Stepping %s sent
Choose your dashboard mode
Choose how you want Printoid to display your dashboard (this can be changed from the app\'s settings later)
OctoPrint credentials missing for this profile: some features may not work properly
OctoPrint credentials not valid for this profile: some features may not work properly
You can thanks the developer for the app or help him to maintain the app and services alive, by donating the amount of your choice!
